Chelsea funding allegedly diverted, deprived tenants

Ex-Chelsea housing chief Michael McLaughlin allegedly used millions in federal funds for personal benefit at the expense of low-income tenants. Federal investigators are expected in Chelsea today. (Boston Globe)
